world.entity

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.entity.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Asteroid, Bullet, Ship

    public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    A class of entities involving a position, velocity, direction, speed limit.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Tom Sydney Kerckhove & Xavier Goas Aguililla
    Invariants:
  • The direction of this ship is a valid direction.
        canHaveAsDirection(getDirection())
  • The position of this ship is a valid position.
        canHaveAsPosition(getPosition())
  • The shape of this ship is a valid shape.
        canHaveAsShape(getShape())
  • The speedLimit of this ship is a valid speed limit.
        canHaveAsSpeedLimit(getSpeedLimit())
  • The velocity of this ship is a valid velocity.
        canHaveAsVelocity(getVelocity())

    • Constructor Detail

      • Entity

        public Entity(Direction direction,
      Position position,
      double speedLimit,
      Velocity velocity,
      CircleShape shape,
      Mass mass)
       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Initializes this new entity with a given direction, position, shape, mass, speed limit and velocity.
        Parameters:
        direction - The given direction.
        position - The given position.
        speedLimit - The given speed limit.
        velocity - The given velocity
        shape - The given circle shape
        mass - The given mass
        Effects:
      • The direction of this entity is set to the given direction.
            setDirection(direction)
      • The position of this entity is set to the given position.
            setPosition(position)
      • The speed limit of this entity is set to the given speed limit.
            setSpeedLimit(speedLimit)
      • The velocity of this entity is set to the given velocity.
            setVelocity(velocity)
      • The circle shape of this entity is set to the given circle shape.
            this.shape = shape
      • The mass of this entity is set to the given mass.
            setMass(mass)
        • Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - [CAN]
            Any of the parameters is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - [CAN]
            The provided shape is not valid.

      • Entity

        public Entity()
        Initializes this new entity with default values.
        Effect:
        Initializes this new entity with the extended entity constructor and default values.
            this(new Direction(), new Position(), Velocity.getSpeedOfLight(), new Velocity())

        Returns:

public void setPosition(Position position)

        Sets the position of this entity to the given position.

        Postcondition:

      • getVelocity

        @Basic
@Raw
public Velocity getVelocity()
        Gets the velocity of this entity.

      • canHaveAsVelocity

        @Basic
@Raw
protected boolean canHaveAsVelocity(Velocity velocity)
        Checks whether this entity can have the given velocity as its velocity.
        Parameters:
        velocity - The velocity to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given velocity is not null and its magnitude is at most the speed limit.
            result = ((velocity != null) && (velocity.getVelocity() <= getSpeedLimit()))

      • setVelocity

        @Basic
@Raw
public void setVelocity(Velocity velocity)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Sets the velocity of this entity to the given velocity.
        Parameters:
        velocity - The new velocity for this entity.
        Postcondition:
        If this entity can have the given velocity as its velocity, then the velocity of this entity is now equal to the given velocity.
            if canHaveAsVelocity(velocity)
             then new.getVelocity() == velocity
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - [CAN]
            isTerminated()

        shape - The shape to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given shape is not null and has a range of at least the minimum radius for ships.
            result = (shape != null)

      • getSpeedLimit

        @Basic
@Raw
public double getSpeedLimit()
        Returns the speed limit of this entity.

      • canHaveAsSpeedLimit

        @Basic
@Raw
protected boolean canHaveAsSpeedLimit(double speedLimit)
        Checks whether this entity can have the given speed limit as its speed limit.
        Parameters:
        speedLimit - The speed limit to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given speed limit is positive and at most the speed of light.
            result = ((speedLimit >= 0) && (speedLimit <= Velocity.getSpeedOfLight()))

      • setSpeedLimit

        @Basic
@Raw
public void setSpeedLimit(double speedLimit)

        Postcondition:

            if canHaveAsSpeedLimit(speedLimit)
             then new.getSpeedLimit() == speedLimit

      • advance

        public void advance(double dt)
        Moves this entity over the given time interval.
        Parameters:
        dt - The time interval for the ship's movement.
        Effect:
        The entity's position vector is altered, taking into account its direction, velocity, and a given time interval.
            move(dt)

      • move

        public void move(double duration)
          throws java.lang.ArithmeticException,
                 java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                 java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Changes the position of this entity based on the current position, velocity and a given duration of the movement.
        Parameters:
        duration - The given duration of the movement.
        Effect:
        Sets the position of this entity to the position after moving.
            getPosittion().moveBy(getVelocity(), duration)
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArithmeticException - [CAN] Any of the resulting vector components is not a number.
            ((Double.isNaN(getPosition.getXComponent()) || Double.isNaN(getPosition.getYComponent()))
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - [CAN] The given duration is strictly negative.
            duration <= 0
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - [CAN]
            isTerminated()

        public void turn(Angle angle)
          throws java.lang.IllegalStateException

        Precondition:
        The given angle is not null.
            angle != null

      • bounce

        public void bounce(Entity that)
        Bounces this entity off another according to the classical laws of physics.
        Parameters:
        that - The entity off which this entity bounces.
        Postcondition:
        The velocity vectors of both entities are modified in accordance with the principles of elastic collision.
            //TODO

      • overlapsWith

        public boolean overlapsWith(Entity e)
        Checks whether the given entity overlaps with this entity.
        Parameters:
        e - The given entity.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given entity is null of the distance between the entities is smaller than the sum of the radii
            result == ((e != null) && (this.distanceTo(e) < getShape().getRadius() + e.getShape().getRadius()))

      • distanceBetween

        public double distanceBetween(Entity other,
                     double duration)
                       throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                              java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Return the distance between this entity and the given entity, if both would move during the given duration.
        Parameters:
        other - The given entity
        duration - The given duration.
        Returns:
        the distance between this entity and the other entity, if both would move during the given time. Util.fuzzyEquals(result,
            this.getPosition().getPositionAfterMove(getVelocity(),
             duration).getDistanceTo(other.getPosition().getPositionAfterMove(other.getVelocity(), duration)) - (this.getShape().getRadius() + other.getShape().getRadius());)
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - [CAN] The given entity is null
            other == null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - [CAN] The given duration is strictly negative
            moveTime < 0.0
